## Description {#details}

This pass calculates the liveness information for each basic block in a function and attaches the register live-out information to a patchpoint intrinsic if present.

This pass can be disabled via the -enable-patchpoint-liveness=false flag. The pass skips functions that don&#39;t have any patchpoint intrinsics. The information provided by this pass is optional and not required by the aformentioned intrinsic to function.

Definition at line 50 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/stackmaplivenessanalysis-cpp">StackMapLivenessAnalysis.cpp</a>.
